title: Drawing, "Drawings. Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored heavy wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
signed: Signed with monogram at bottom right.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper center: blue / topazy; again, at upper right: blueish green / Dusky warm; again, at left center: warm golden; and bottom right:  Jamaica July //65 / monogram
description: Horizontal view of the sun shining from behind clouds upon mountain ranges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawings. Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-10-a.
